title: Cant login ?
body:
am i the only one who cant login ?
connection error ?{{champion:23}}

replies.body:
Hi - 

What point do you get the connection error at?

Did your client install today's patch, or are you getting stuck there?
Are you able to enter user/pass, but it fails while logging on?

Depending on which one it is - check out the support page for [patcher issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434), or [login issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944)

You can also get in touch with player support if it is an ongoing thing (just hit "submit a request" on one of the pages linked above)

Cheers!
Mindstar

Hello Agent Mindstar. Can you please help me out can you look at my URGENT RIOT discussion. I really need help and someone with a big heart to help my account i'm getting upset and angry on something i didn't do. I submitted a case and i got an automated reply I need someone to please help me with my account.
